website_summaries.verdict: This tinted moisturizer has a lightweight consistency and nice features, including more color options than most tinted moisturizers and SPF 18.
pros: Has a creamy consistency and goes on smoothly
Comes in seven different shades rather than only two or three
Doesn't feel heavy on the skin, plus a little goes a long way
Evens tone without hiding the skin for a flattering no-makeup look
cons: Doesn't always wear well in hot/humid weather
May not work with cool undertones or deeper skin tones

customer_reviews.text: I read about this product on a beauty blog. It is the best tinted moisturizer ever! it goes on evenly and provides a light coverage without looking like you are wearing makeup. Perfect for weekends and casual days when you want to look good but not all made up!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M. Dussault

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup for non-makeup wearers!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally weak makeup, so tinted moisturizer is as far as I typically go. This one is smooth, easy to apply, and does not feel "heavy" on your face. I don't need to use very much to cover my whole face, so this bottle should last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Beacon

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Expensive Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite tinted moisturizer at the moment. I have been on a mission looking for a tinted moisturizer that not only feels light but has great coverage. I am an Urban Decay junkie but thought their tinted moisturizer wasn't up to par. I use this almost every day and apply w/a sponge I picked up from Sephora- great coverage, light feeling and SPF!! What more could a girl want?
customer_reviews.author: eden love

customer_reviews.title: but I have a light to medium complexion and the color suits me fine. I like that is is a little heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect from the color, but I have a light to medium complexion and the color suits me fine. I like that is is a little heavier than regular moisturizer, but not quite a foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the lightness of this product and the even coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightness of this product and the even coverage. It smooths out my skin and gives the impression of not wearing makeup. Great under mineral powder for a more formal look.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product if everything it was described. Love the creamyness of the balm. Feels like a moisturizer going on, but gives a natural hint of color to my complexion. This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Really love this product
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product. The coverage is perfect - light but just enough to even out while still showing things like freckles. I have pretty sensitive skin and haven't had any issues with it. I did go a little lighter in shade than I may have otherwise, due to reviews, and I think that was the right call.
customer_reviews.author: EMAY

customer_reviews.title: Great product looks and feels amazing on my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it feels soft and light weight on my skin and evens out my skin tone and looks natural. It applies smooth and is not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: MissCali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for good moisturizer when putting makeup on. It works well for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: krystin M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for a light everyday BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Balm Shelter Product since a friend of mine was selling it at her boutique in Atlanta. Great every day moisturizer with tint and the 2 ounce size lasts a long time. Doesn't use much to get a lot of coverage. My daughters like it too. they use a the light tint.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic tinter moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tinter moisturizer, but it was a little too orangey for my skin tone. Goes on extremely smooth and light, love the lightweight feeling of this product. Definitely helped clear my complexion, as it is not heavy and leaves skin able to breathe!
customer_reviews.author: Sydnie Paige

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Not a heavy makeup and I don’t need to put a moisturizer on first! It’s the perfect shade and lasts all day and you only need a small amount so this tube will last a few months!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Kienholz

customer_reviews.title: Converted
customer_reviews.text: I usually do full coverage only since I have a lot of discoloration, freckles, and redness in my skin. This product has converted me to tinted moisturizers. It is thinner than a more expensive tinted moisturizer I was trying but covers better. It absorbs quickly and a little goes a long way. It'll last long since you don't need very much and I am perfectly comfortable wearing it out and about all day. The coverage holds fine and doesn't fade terribly. I was really impressed with how it made my skin feel. I have sensitive and extremely dry skin, especially in the winter. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hinman Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for a natural, yet finished look.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product for a quick makeup look. It's able to be layered, so I use two layers of this and a setting powder and I'm good to go for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Jalissa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!! I've tried several tinted moisturizers & this ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!! I've tried several tinted moisturizers & this one is by far, the best I've used yet! Blends & covers well. I like the thicker & soft texture of it. I have a lighter complexion, but expect it to become a couple shades darker, now that summers aporoaching. So, this level of tint works perfectly for me.. very natural looking. I would highly recommend this product! It has now become my, go to tinted moisturizer. I needed search any further!
customer_reviews.author: TrippyLocks

customer_reviews.title: Not for me..
customer_reviews.text: This kinda even out my skin tone, but the coverage is very light. It wasn't for my skin as my skin became irritated of it. I was excited for this item as I saw many great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Time Balm fan now!
customer_reviews.text: The best tinted moisturizer I've found! I had used a different product previously, and this is far superior. I add a bit of moisturizer so it goes on even lighter and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: constant reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right moisture and coverage for me. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cmr1960

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason women voted this product best tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason women voted this product best tinted moisturizer. It gives great coverage and has a light feel. Can't believe how inexpensive it is. I've paid much more for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vann

customer_reviews.title: The best tinted moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: The best tinted moisturizer! I swear by it. It is smooth, light and protects my face beautifully. Perfect for our more mature faces.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer b

customer_reviews.title: Tinted Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have tried this product and I was very surprised how dry it felt. I will actually have to blend it in another mositurizer so I don't think that's a good thing. BUT if you are looking for something dry in a tube this is the right product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for..I have a different product I use from Olay but was bummed when they stopped carrying the product. This is just like what I used to use , a nice color and is a thin liquid. I've tried thicker types and it feels more like a foundation than just a tinted moisturizer. Delivery was very quick I got it two days after I ordered! I ordered the light/medium type and it works great with my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shade delivered
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! But.. this is my red time ordering it. Each time I have gotten the wrong shade. I ordered light and I am getting the light/medium. I love this product if it the right shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Nice stuff, but they've raised the price to the point where I am looking at other products. It is nice and smooth, and good color.
customer_reviews.author: Harrie Bosche

customer_reviews.title: Minimal coverage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and blend but provides minimal coverage for redness and blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Bree
